# Test: Agent exits without signaling - treated as failure
gitinit
cp kamaji.yaml kamaji.yaml
exec git add .
exec git commit -m 'init'

# Empty script means agent exits immediately without MCP calls
env KAMAJI_AGENT_SCRIPT=''
! exec kamaji start --spawner-cmd=mock-agent
stderr 'stuck'

-- kamaji.yaml --
name: test
base_branch: main
tickets:
  - name: TEST-1
    branch: feat/test-1
    tasks:
      - description: Task 1
